actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend to all unmarried individuals the full tax benefits of income splitting now enjoyed by married individuals filing joint returns.

summary.text: Makes the rate table contained in the Internal Revenue Code that is presently applicable to married individuals filing joint returns applicable to all individuals filing income tax returns except for heads of households.

titles.title: A bill to extend to all unmarried individuals the full tax benefits of income splitting now enjoyed by married individuals filing joint returns.
